Name: Argo MPUV Cargo
Description:
Manufacturer: Argo Astronautics
Focus: Light Freight

The Argo Astronautics MPUV Cargo is a dedicated merchant transfer ship. A ubiquitous intergalactic stevedore, vast numbers of MPUV Cargos are responsible for loading and unloading goods onto ships that can't otherwise land on planets or drydocks, such as the Hull D and the Orion. Some hauler captains choose to own and operate their own Argo, while others prefer to contract with the local Argo owners found at many of the busier ports.
